text: Embraer ERJ family is a series of of twin-engine regional jets produced by Embraer. The aircraft are ERJ135, ERJ140 and ERJ145. It is popular amongst some regional airlines, such as American Eagle, A small carrier apart of American airlines, Contour Airlines, Former operator for Delta Airlines, And many more much smaller airlines mainly used for charters and etc. ERJ
title: Embraer ERJ family
